name: Joseph BUONCUORE, Sr., Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA GAME COMMISSION, Vernon R. Ross, Executive Director P.G.C., William R. Pouss, Chief Counsel P.G.C., Thomas R. Littwin, Hearing Officer P.G.C., Appellees

parties: Joseph BUONCUORE, Sr., Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA GAME COMMISSION, Vernon R. Ross, Executive Director P.G.C., William R. Pouss, Chief Counsel P.G.C., Thomas R. Littwin, Hearing Officer P.G.C., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of December, 2005, it is hereby ordered that the Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
Joseph BUONCUORE, Sr., Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA GAME COMMISSION, Vernon R. Ross, Executive Director P.G.C., William R. Pouss, Chief Counsel P.G.C., Thomas R. Littwin, Hearing Officer P.G.C., Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 27, 2005.
